channel.title: Xp rate and pickup
channel.description: well i have a server thats czar based and the source is allstar but i want the xp rate to be slower and the pickup commands wont work plz help!!

item.title: Xp rate and pickup
item.dc:creator: @T_A_G T A G
item.description:
@T_A_G wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }
                        if (newItemID <= 9000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
                        } else {
                            message("No such item");
                        }
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        message(
                                "I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::pickup 995 1");
                    }
                }
            }

Thats code for pickup and to change xp rate go to client.java search your current xp rate and erase it with the xp rate you want.

Read full topic
